data.eml:eml: A new species of the genus Monopelopia from South Brazil, with keys to the Neotropical – Nearctic species (Diptera: Chironomidae: Tanypodinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Oliveira, Caroline Silva Neubern De, Mendes, Humberto Fonseca, Silva, Mário Antônio Navarro Da (2010): A new species of the genus Monopelopia from South Brazil, with keys to the Neotropical – Nearctic species (Diptera: Chironomidae: Tanypodinae). Zootaxa 2420: 53-62, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.194456
